### Tekan untuk coret.

```{=html}
<style>
    .container {
        background-color: white;
        padding: 20px;
        border-radius: 8px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        width: 100%;
    }

    ul {
        list-style-type: none;
        padding: 0;
    }

    li {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .task {
        display: none;
    }

    .task-label {
        margin-right: 10px;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: color 0.3s, text-decoration 0.3s;
    }

    .task:checked + .task-label {
        color: #999;
        text-decoration: line-through;
    }
</style>
```

<ul id="todo-list">

<li><input type="checkbox" class="task" id="task1"> <label for="task1" class="task-label">[1]    Task 1</label></li>

</ul>

```{=html}
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        const tasks = document.querySelectorAll('.task');

        // Load saved tasks state from local storage
        tasks.forEach((task, index) => {
            const taskState = localStorage.getItem(`task${index}`);
            if (taskState === 'checked') {
                task.checked = true;
            }
        });

        // Add event listeners to update state on input change
        tasks.forEach((task, index) => {
            task.addEventListener('change', () => {
                localStorage.setItem(`task${index}`, task.checked ? 'checked' : 'unchecked');
            });
        });

        // Check if the date has changed
        const lastVisit = localStorage.getItem('lastVisit');
        const today = new Date().toDateString();

        if (lastVisit !== today) {
            // Reset all tasks
            tasks.forEach((task, index) => {
                task.checked = false;
                localStorage.setItem(`task${index}`, 'unchecked');
            });
            localStorage.setItem('lastVisit', today);
        }
    });
</script>
```
